content: “Assay-Guided Extraction and Kinetics of Radical Scavenging Activity of Curcumin from the Rhizome of Curcuma Longa Linn: Assay-Guided Extraction of Curcumin from C. Longa”. Fountain Journal of Natural and Applied Sciences 8, no. 1 (June 28, 2019). Accessed December 30, 2025. https://fountainjournals.com/index.php/FUJNAS/article/view/190.
